FFECTOR
Unique.Programmable.Live.
Affector revolutionises festival stages. Our exclusive visualisation engine creates mind-bending, audio synchronized visual experiences.We pioneered the breath-taking visual projections for the iconic Genosys stage (Block9) at Glastonbury Festival.

BESPOKE SOFTWARE

Our propietary software makes it easy to experiment, create scenes, and perform live, offering countless possibilities for automation and performance.

BUILT FOR LIVE PERFORMANCE

Built with live performance in mind, exposing a plethora of live controls - and desktop / touchscreen compatible. Unlike other static visual shows, every performance with AFFECTOR can be as dynamic or unique as you like. Harness your creativity and perform with the music.Want it simple? No problem, just use your pre-built scenes, sit back and enjoy the show.

STEP SEQUENCER

AFFECTOR takes the step sequencer to the next level, with unique multi-layer control over state, triggers and values. This makes performance and automation a breeze.

SCENE LAUNCHER

All your scenes are at your fingertips, with the ability to preview before launching to live. Prepare your scenes before the show and launch with a single click.

WORK WITH US

We are continuously improving our propietary software, and we would love to collaborate on exciting new projects.If you are interested in working with us, or finding out more, please contact us at info@affector.io - we look forward to hearing from you!
